title: ECE professors
content: How are these profs in general? Are they strict ? Do they teach well ? Thanks in advance

comments.body:
1. I dont know about Anuros Thomas, she never took us  
2. SS Rekha ‚ò†Ô∏è‚ò†Ô∏è‚ò†Ô∏è RIP

Anuros : GG, she is calm and approachable for anything, she will make sure you understand stuff

Rekha : RIP... and that too ACD üíÄ

Suganthi: No idea

Sahana : RIP she is the worst

Chandar: ATB.. he is good, but he will skin you alive if you do anything that he hates like coming late to class, using phone in class etc.
Damn whats with Rekha and Sahana ?
Rekha is decent.. but ACD is smt thats not easy to understand.. you need to really put effort to learn it. Analog is always the most difficult subject in ECE
Lol both of them dont know anything about the subject

Everyone is scared in ECE.  
Thank God I am out of this next year
